elements.title: News(Top News : A cold snap descends on the nation with the season's first cold wave alerts issued for Seoul and the central inland areas.) - 2023.11.07 PM5
News(Top News : The government bans short selling until the end of June, citing such illegal transactions by global investment banks and institutions.) - 2023.11.06 PM5
News(Top News : Rival parties continue to clash over the incorporation of Gimpo into Seoul.) - 2023.11.03 PM5
News(Top News : Seoul's spy agency says North Korean leader Kim Jong-un ordered his officials to find ways to support Palestine amid the Israel-Hamas war.) - 2023.11.02 PM5
News(Top News : Exports increase for the first time in 13 months in October, helped by a smaller decline in semiconductor sales.) - 2023.11.01 PM5
News(Top News : President Yoon Suk Yeol calls on a partisan parliament to approve a slim budget, blaming the hostile economic situation.) - 2023.10.31 PM5
News(Top News : Families of the Itaewon crowd crush victims walk from the site of the tragedy to central Seoul calling for an independent probe on its one-year anniversary.) - 2023.10.30 PM5
News(Top News : Israeli forces expand air and ground operations in Gaza, causing Internet and communication to be cut off in the area) - 2023.10.28 PM5
News(Top News : Israeli Forces kill the second-in-command of Hamas intelligence, who was considered one of the masterminds of the October 7th attack.) - 2023.10.27 PM5
